description: Teleports the player to the first room of the current floor

There is a guaranteed Fool card in the Depths 2, if you bomb the skull with an X on it. This is intended give you a guaranteed way to teleport out of the Mom's Foot fight, for accessing the path to the Mausoleum floor
c1.title: O - The Fool
c1.subtitle: Where your journey begins

description: For the current room, tears now have the Spoon Bender effect, which allows them to curve towards enemies and gives them a purрle appearance.
c2.title: I - The Magician
c2.subtitle: May you never miss your goal

description: Summons Mom's foot which will stomp on a random enemy in the current room, dealing 300 damage
If no enemies are in the current room, the foot will target Isaac (and do damage if it hits), however it can be used to break rocks
c3.title: II - The High Priestess
c3.subtitle: Mother is watching you

description: Gives the player the Whore of Babylon effect for the current room, increasing damage and speed
c4.title: III - The Empress
c4.subtitle: May your rage bring power

description: Teleports the player to the Boss room on the current floor
c5.title: IV - The Emperor
c5.subtitle: Challenge me!

description: Spawns 2 Soul hearts on the floor
c6.title: V - The Hierophant
c6.subtitle: Two prayers for the lost

description: Spawns 2 red hearts on the floor
c7.title: VI - The Lovers
c7.subtitle: May you prosper and be in good health

description: Grants the same effect as 'My Little Unicorn', which makes Isaac invincible and deal 40 contact damage to enemies per hit
c8.title: VII - The Chariot
c8.subtitle: May nothing stand before you

description: Spawns 1 bomb, 1 key, 1 coin, 1 heart, which can be random variants of each
c9.title: VIII - Justice
c9.subtitle: May your future become balanced

description: Teleports the player to the Shop
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no shops on those floors
c10.title: IX - The Hermit
c10.subtitle: May you see what life has to offer

description: Spawns a Slot Machine or a Fortune Machine
c11.title: X - Wheel of Fortune
c11.subtitle: Spin the wheel of destiny

description: Gives the player the Magic Mushroom effect, which increasing size and all stats by 1 for the current room
If you use the Strength card with 12 heart containers, it will take you down to 11 when you leave the room
c12.title: XI - Strength
c12.subtitle: May your power bring rage

description: Gives the player the flying effect for the current room, allowing the player to fly over obstacles in the room
This card is useless if you have any item which allows you to permanently fly
c13.title: XII - The Hanged Man
c13.subtitle: May you find enlightenment

description: Deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room in a similar style to the Necronomicon
c14.title: XIII - Death
c14.subtitle: Lay waste to all that oppose you

description: Spawns a Blood Donation Machine
c15.title: XIV - Temperance
c15.subtitle: May you be pure in heart

description: Gives the Book of Belial effect for the current room, increasing damage
c16.title: XV - The Devil
c16.subtitle: Revel in the power of your darkness

description: Spawns some troll bombs at random locations in the current room
Each bomb deals 60 damage (normal bomb damage
c17.title: XVI - The Tower
c17.subtitle: Destruction brings creation

description: Teleports the player to the Item Room
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no item rooms on those floors
c18.title: XVII - The Stars
c18.subtitle: May you find what you desire

description: Teleports the player to the Secret Room
c19.title: XVIII - The Moon
c19.subtitle: May you find all you have lost

description: A card with three uses: A full heal, deals 100 damage to all enemies in the current room and reveals the entire map for the current floor (Treasure Map + The Compass)
c20.title: XIX - The Sun
c20.subtitle: May the light heal and enlighten you

description: Spawns a beggar
Has a chance to be a demon beggar
Killing a Devil Beggar, Key Master, or Shell Game Beggar gives you an increased chance of finding Angel rooms instead of Devil rooms. See the dedicated Devil room page for more details
c21.title: XX - Judgement
c21.subtitle: Judge lest ye be judged

description: Reveals the entire map and shows the icons for every room which has one
This is completely useless if you currently have both the Treasure Map and The Compass
c22.title: XXI - The World
c22.subtitle: Open your eyes and see

description: Doubles the number of Bombs you have
If you have no bombs, it gives you two
c23.title: 2 of Clubs
c23.subtitle: Item multiplier

description: Doubles the number of coins you have
If you have no coins, it gives you two
c24.title: 2 of Diamonds
c24.subtitle: Item multiplier

description: Doubles the number of keys you have
If you have no keys, it gives you two
c25.title: 2 of Spades
c25.subtitle: Item multiplier

description: Doubles your current red hearts up to full health
This card is useless for the Bluе Baby
c26.title: 2 of Hearts
c26.subtitle: Item multiplier

description: When used, turns all pickups, chests and non-boss enemies in the room into Bombs
c27.title: Ace of Clubs
c27.subtitle: Convert all
c27.unlock: Unlock this item by getting a 3 win streak

description: When used, turns all pickups, chests and non-boss enemies in the room into Coins
c28.title: Ace of Diamonds
c28.subtitle: Convert all
c28.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb in under 20 minutes

description: When used, turns all pickups, chests and non-boss enemies in the room into Keys
c29.title: Ace of Spades
c29.subtitle: Convert all
c29.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb without taking hearts, coins and bombs

description: When used, turns all pickups, chests and non-boss enemies in the room into Hearts
c30.title: Ace of Hearts
c30.subtitle: Convert all
c30.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating any floor after Basement I with only half a heart of health (works as The Lost)

description: Teleports you to the Devil Deal Room on the current floor
c31.title: The Joker

description: When used, this rune will destroy all breakable objects in the current room, such as poop, rocks, secret room entrances
This includes Key Blocks
c32.title: Rune of Hagalaz
c32.subtitle: Destruction
c32.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #1 (Pitch Black)

description: When used this rune will double all pickups on the floor in the room
Creates copies of pickups in the Shop which can be taken for free, even if you haven't purchased them yet
Can be used to double the number of item chests in the first room of the final Chest / Dark Room floors
Cloned chests have the same types of items as the first one
Cannot be used to clone trinkets or other Jera runes
c33.title: Rune of Jera
c33.subtitle: Abundance
c33.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #2 (High Brow)

description: Creates a trapdoor on the floor
Has a 8% chance to spawn a door to a Crawl Space instead
c34.title: Rune of Ehwaz
c34.subtitle: Passage
c34.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #3 (Head Trauma)

description: Removes the curse which is in effect on the current floor (except Curse of the Labyrinth)
Can also cure the effect of the Amnesia pill
+1 Soul Heart
c35.title: Rune of Dagaz
c35.subtitle: Purity
c35.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #4 (Darkness Falls)

description: When used, reveals the entire map including all the secret room locations and other icon rooms
c36.title: Rune of Ansuz
c36.subtitle: Vision
c36.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #5 (The Tank)

description: Rerolls all pedestal items in the current room (One time use of the D6)
c37.title: Rune of Perthro
c37.subtitle: Change
c37.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #6 (Solar System)

description: Summons 3 blue friendly spiders and 3 blue flies
c38.title: Rune of Berkano
c38.subtitle: Companionship
c38.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #20 (Purist)

description: When used, gives you an invincibility effect which lasts for 20 seconds
c39.title: Rune of Algiz
c39.subtitle: Resistance
c39.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #8 (Cat Got Your Tongue)

description: When used, gives a random Mystic rune effect
Possible effects include: Algiz, Ansuz, Berkano, Dagaz, Ehwaz, Hagalaz, Jera, Perthro
Also has a 25% chance to spawn another Blank Rune upon use
c40.title: Blank Rune
c40.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #30 (Guardian)

description: When used, this rune deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room and consumes all pedestal items in the room, giving you a random stat increase for each item consumed
Also consumes all pickups in the room and turns them into blue flies and spiders
c41.title: Black Rune
c41.subtitle: Void
c41.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greedier mode as Apollyon

description: A card which can be thrown as a projectile directly infront of Isaac, instantly killing anything it hits, including most bosses
If thrown at a multi-phase boss with multiple forms such Satan, Mega Satan or Hush it will only kill that particular phase of the boss
If thrown at a multi-phase boss that works from a single health bar such as Isaac, ??? or The Lamb, it will die instantly
Will not kill Delirium of The Beast
Will destroy rocks and poop in its path
Can also be thrown against a door to open it (Doesn't work against Mega Satan's door)
c42.title: Chaos Card
c42.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #9 (Demo Man)

description: When used, removes the price tag from all items in the current shop or devil deal, making everything free
The effect of the Credit Card only lasts for the current room
c43.title: Credit Card
c43.subtitle: Charge it!
c43.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #10 (Cursed!)

description: Displays a random cryptic message on the screen similar to the fortune machine ones. One of the following messages may show:
"Rooms may yield more than you expect"
"Some doors require a blessing. Carry them with you"
"The walls will harden over time. Time is the essence"
"Sleeping gatekeepers will need to be awoken with a loud sound"
"A piece of paper is your guide"
"Deny his gifts to attain your reward"
"A dark market lies under your feet
"Chub dislikes smoke!
c44.title: Rules Card
c44.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #11 (Glass Cannon)

description: When used, fills the entire room with poop!
c45.title: Card Against Humanity
c45.subtitle: Something stinks...
c45.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #12 (When Life Gives You Lemons)

description: When used, instantly kills you and spawns 10 pickup on the floor
Each of the 10 things spawned can be any type of consumable or sometimes a pedestal item (up to a maximum of 3 pedestal items)
Any pedestal item created by Suicide King will be related to the room where it was used, meaning that using it in the Angel room will spawn Angel room items
c46.title: Suicide King
c46.subtitle: A true ending?
c46.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #7 (Suicide King)

description: When used, will open all doors in the current room, similar to a one-time use of Dad's Key
c47.title: Get Out Of Jail Free Card
c47.subtitle: Open sesame
c47.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #22 (Speed)

description: When used this card will activate a use of your spacebar item for free
c48.title: ? Card
c48.subtitle: Double active

description: Gives a one-time use of the D6 and D20 effects at the same time
c49.title: Dice Shard

description: When used will cause two of Mom's Hand to come down and grab a random enemy
c50.title: Emergency Contact
c50.subtitle: Help from above

description: Grants the Holy Mantle effect for, which will negate your next hit of damage
The effect persist between rooms/floors
Tainted Lost starts with this card, and while playing as this character all cards and runes have a 10% chance to turn into a Holy Card
c51.title: Holy Card
c51.subtitle: You feel protected
c51.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with The Lost

description: Temporarily makes Isaac huge, giving him +7 Damage Up and +30 Range Up for the rest of the current room
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140
c52.title: Huge Growth
c52.subtitle: Become immense!
c52.unlock: Unlock this item by getting 5 items or consumables that increase your size, e.g. 'One Makes you Larger' pills, Magic Mushroom etc

description: Spawns 3 random cards on the floor when used
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140
c53.title: Ancient Recall
c53.subtitle: Draw 3 cards

description: When used, this card will slow down enemies, Isaac's tears by -1 Shot Speed, but speed up Isaac's movement speed by +0.50 for the rest of the current room
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140
c54.title: Era Walk
c54.subtitle: Savor the moment
c54.unlock: Unlock this item by getting both the Broken Watch and the Stop Watch in your collection

description: Activates a random rune effect. The effect is weaker than normal runes.
These only appear if not all runes have been unlocked yet.
c55.title: Rune Shard
c55.subtitle: It still glows faintly

description: Drops all hearts on the floor leaving you at half a red heart. Dropped hearts may become other pickups like bombs/keys, or even pickup-related items like A Quarter or Boom!
c56.title: O - The Fool?
c56.subtitle: Let go and move on
c56.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Lost

description: Gives you a blue aura that repels enemy projectiles, causing them to slowly curve away from Isaac and avoid hitting him
Lasts for 60 seconds
c57.title: I - The Magician?
c57.subtitle: May no harm come to you
c57.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Judas

description: Causes Mom's Foot to keep stomping down randomly for 60 seconds where Isaac is standing
c58.title: II - The High Priestess?
c58.subtitle: Run
c58.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Lilith

description: Gives 2 HP Up and +1.5 Tears Up for 60 seconds
c59.title: III - The Empress?
c59.subtitle: May your love bring protection
c59.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Eve

description: Teleports you to an extra boss room, that drops a Boss room item as normal. This room isn't part of the actual floor, and leaving it returns you to where you teleported from
The boss isn't necessarily from the current floor - e.g. you could find a caves boss in the basement
c60.title: IV - The Emperor?
c60.subtitle: May you find a worthy opponent
c60.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted ???

description: Spawns 2 Bone hearts on the floor
c61.title: V - The Hierophant?
c61.subtitle: Two prayers for the forgotten
c61.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Bethany

description: Spawns a random pedestal item from the current room's item pool
In exchange, turns one heart container into a broken heart. Broken hearts permanently subtract from your total possible health containers
c62.title: VI - The Lovers?
c62.subtitle: May your heart shatter to pieces
c62.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Magdalene

description: Isaac turns to stone and can't move for 10 seconds, but your tear rate goes up significantly for the duration
c63.title: VII - The Chariot?
c63.subtitle: May nothing walk past you
c63.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating challenge #42 (Hot Potato)

description: Spawns 2-4 locked gold chests
c64.title: VIII - Justice?
c64.subtitle: May your sins come back to torment you
c64.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating challenge #43 (Cantripped)

description: When used, all items and pickups in the current room are turned into money. Everything is sold for its shop price, e.g. Items for 15c, hearts for 3c
c65.title: IX - The Hermit?
c65.subtitle: May you see the value of all things in life
c65.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating challenge #44 (Red Redemption)

description: Activates a random effect from a Dice room
See the dice icon above for each possible effect
c66.title: X - Wheel of Fortune?
c66.subtitle: Throw the dice of fate
c66.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Cain

description: All enemies in the current room are slowed and take double damage
c67.title: XI - Strength?
c67.subtitle: May you break their resolve
c67.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Samson

description: You turn into the Keeper, gaining triple shot, -0.1 Speed Down for 30 seconds
Enemies drop random coins while this effect is active
c68.title: XII - The Hanged Man?
c68.subtitle: May your greed know no bounds
c68.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Keeper

description: Activates the Book of the Dead effect, spawning a bone orbital or charmed Bony for each enemy killed in the current room
c69.title: XIII - Death?
c69.subtitle: May life spring forth from the fallen
c69.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Forgotten

description: When used, this card activates 5 random pill effects one after the other
c70.title: XIV - Temperance?
c70.subtitle: May your hunger be satiated
c70.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating challenge #45 (DELETE THIS)

description: Activates The Bible effect (granting flight) and gives a Seraphim familiar for 30 seconds
c71.title: XV - The Devil?
c71.subtitle: Bask in the light of your mercy
c71.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Azazel

description: Fills the room with random rocks, pots and other objects, creating a maze between the doors
It won't block any doors that exist
Rocks have a pretty good chance to become tinted rocks
c72.title: XVI - The Tower?
c72.subtitle: Creation brings destruction
c72.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Apollyon

description: Removes your oldest passive item and spawns 2 pedestal items from the current room's pool
c73.title: XVII - The Stars?
c73.subtitle: May your loss bring fortune
c73.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Isaac

description: Teleports you to the ultra secret room on the floor

The ultra secret room is a red room containing an item from the angel room item pool. Can only be accessed via the Red Key, Crystal Key or Cracked Key. Using this card will also open a pathway of red rooms back to the regular floor
c74.title: XVIII - The Moon?
c74.subtitle: May you remember lost memories
c74.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Jacob

description: When used, grants +1.5 Damage Up, turns your hearts to Bone hearts and the Spirit of the Night effect (Spectral tears and the ability to fly) for the current floor
Also gives the Curse of Darkness effect that can't be removed for the current floor
c75.title: XIX - The Sun?
c75.subtitle: May the darkness swallow all around you
c75.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Jacob

description: Spawns a beggar
Spawns a Restock machine
c76.title: XX - Judgement?
c76.subtitle: May you redeem those found wanting
c76.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Lazarus

description: Creates a trapdoor to a guaranteed crawl space
c77.title: XXI - The World?
c77.subtitle: Step into the abyss
c77.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Eden

description: This is a one-time use of the Red Key item.

The main purpose of the Cracked Key is to unlock Tainted character in the Home floor without needing to find the Red Key. You can force spawn a cracked key by droping any trinket in a Boss Room or Item room, on any floor on your way down to Depths II. When you take the reverse path back up to Home, the trinket will turn into Cracked Key in the same floor/room you dropped it before.
c78.title: Cracked Key
c78.unlock: Unlock this card by opening Mom's Box on the Home floor.

description: Drops 1-12 full red hearts on the floor
c79.title: Queen of Hearts
c79.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Mega Satan as Tainted Magdalene

description: When used, this copies the effect of the card, pill, rune, soul stone or active item you used most recently
c80.title: Wild Card
c80.subtitle: Again
c80.unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Mega Satan as Tainted Eden

description: Turns all pedestal items in the current room into rotating items, which cycle between the old item and a random new item every second
This allows you to effectively reroll items like with The D6, but choose the old item as well if you want
Tainted Isaac has this effect passively for all items
If you use more than one in the same room, each pedestal item will cycle through +1 random item
Items are chosen from the item pool related to the current item
c81.title: Soul of Isaac
c81.subtitle: Reroll... or not
c81.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Isaac

description: When used, all enemies in the current room drop half a red heart that will disappear after 2 seconds if not picked up
c82.title: Soul of Magdalene
c82.subtitle: Give me your love!
c82.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Magdalene

description: When used, this Soul Stone creates Red rooms for every possible exit in the current room
Red outlines of doors appear where this Soul Stone will create exits for
See the Red Key item description for more information about these Red rooms behave
c83.title: Soul of Cain
c83.subtitle: Opens the unopenable
c83.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Cain

description: Activates the Dark Arts item effect, which turns Isaac into a ghost for a few seconds. While in this form you can walk over enemies to mark them for death. After a few seconds, he will quickly attack each target, chaining higher damage for each enemy it hits
c84.title: Soul of Judas
c84.subtitle: Right behind you
c84.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Judas

description: When used this will cause 8 poison farts that leave a brown creep behind, and then drop 7 Butt Bombs very quickly
Standing in the creep gives you +1 Damage Up and +1.35 Tears Up
c85.title: Soul of ???
c85.subtitle: Chemical warfare
c85.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Blue Baby

description: For the current room, 14 Dead Birds fly in from off the screen and attack all enemies, dealing low but frequent damage
c86.title: Soul of Eve
c86.subtitle: Your very own murder
c86.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Eve

description: Isaac gains the Berserk! effect for 10 seconds. This gives Isaac a bone sword and he goes on a killing rampage, gaining +0.4 Speed, +3 Flat Damage Up
c87.title: Soul of Samson
c87.subtitle: Slay a thousand
c87.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Samson

description: Activates the Mega Blast item effect, which gives you a giant laser that deals x5 your tear damage per tick to anything in its path and pushing Isaac back by the force
The effect lasts for 8 seconds but does persist between rooms
c88.title: Soul of Azazel
c88.subtitle: Demon rage!
c88.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Azazel

description: When used this kills Isaac and revives him with 1/2 a red heart. You get a couple of seconds of invincibility to move away after
The main benefit of this Soul Stone is that it automatically activates if you die, meaning it is effectively an extra passive life while held
c89.title: Soul of Lazarus
c89.subtitle: Life after death
c89.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Lazarus

description: Activates the D6 and D20 effects, rerolling all items and pickups in the room. Unlike the regular D6, rerolled items can pick from any item pool
c90.title: Soul of Eden
c90.subtitle: Embrace chaos
c90.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Eden

description: When used, Isaac dies and becomes The Lost for the current room. This gives you his ability to fly, and the Holy Mantle effect. However if you take damage a second time you die like the Lost does
Same effect as touching a white fire, but only lasts one room
c91.title: Soul of the Lost
c91.subtitle: Leave your body behind
c91.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Lost

description: Gives you 1 random permanent familiar
c92.title: Soul of Lilith
c92.subtitle: Motherhood
c92.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Lilith

description: Spawns up to 25 random coins on the floor
c93.title: Soul of the Keeper
c93.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Keeper

description: Creates 15 random Locusts
Locusts are variants of blue flies, except they have special effects based on the color
War (Red) - Explodes when touching the enemy. The actual explosion deals flat 60 damage
Pestilence (Green) - Poisons the enemy it attacks
Famine (Brown) - Applies a slowing effect
Death (Black) - Deals x4 damage instead of x2
Conquest (White) - Spawns 2-5 at once
c94.title: Soul of Apollyon
c94.subtitle: Bringer of calamity
c94.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Apollyon

description: Gives you The Forgotten as a temporary familiar, with 2 Bone hearts and his bone weapon. He behaves the same as how Esau works with Jacob, following your exact movements
Disappears after the current room or if he takes enough damage and dies
c95.title: Soul of the Forgotten
c95.subtitle: Skeletal protector
c95.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Forgotten

description: Creates 6 wisps, similar to the Book of Virtues effect
Mosts wisps will be the standard blue ones, but have a chance to have random special properties
c96.title: Soul of Bethany
c96.subtitle: Friends from beyond
c96.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Bethany

description: Spawns Esau as a temporary familiar, who copies your exact movements the same as how the Jacob & Esau character works
Disappears after the current room or if he takes enough damage and dies
c97.title: Soul of Jacob and Esau
c97.subtitle: Bound by blood
c97.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Jacob

description: Once picked up, you gain unlimited key use for the rest of the floor
c98.title: Gold Key

description: Once picked up, you gain unlimited bomb use for the rest of the floor
c99.title: Gold Bomb
c99.unlock: Unlock this item by beating challenge #23 (Blue Bomber)

description: Once picked up, the gold heart will drop money on the floor the next time Isaac loses a heart
c100.title: Gold Heart
c100.unlock: Unlock this item by beating challenge #21 (XXXXXXXXL)

description: Takes three hits to deplete and can be refilled with red hearts, but disappears forever when depleted
c101.title: Bone Heart
c101.unlock: Unlock this item by unlocking the Forgotten character. See the Broken Shovel / Mom's Shovel items for more information on how to unlock
